title: When You Die
lyrics:
I'm not that nice
I'm mean and I'm evil
Don't call me nice
I'm gonna eat your heart out
I've got some work to do
Baby, I'm getting ready ready ready to blow my head off



Go fuck yourself

You heard me right

Don't call me nice, again

Don't you have somewhere to be at seven thirty?

Baby, I'm getting ready ready ready to blow my brains out



 words won't do anything

I won't feel anything

... That's all that's left with you when you die



 words won't do anything

I won't feel anything

... That's all that's left with you when you die



Go fuck yourself

I'm mean not nice

You said it twice

You said it twice

Don't you have somewhere to be at seven thirty?

I've got some work to do

I'm gonna eat your heart out

I heard you the first time
